Research

My current research interests are in Theoritical and Applied Fluid Dynamics, Dynamical Systems, Geophysical Fluid Dynamics.
  • Sensitivity of internal wave energy distribution over seabed corrugations to adjacent seabed features, F. Karimpour, A. Zareei & M.-R. Alam, under review
  • Perfect cloaking in shallow water waves via nonlinear medium transformation, A. Zareei & M.-R. Alam, Journal of Fluid Mechanics, 778, pp 273-287
  • Simulation of Perturbed Stellar Systems Using CUDA programming, with Professor M. A. Jalali, Mechanical Engineering Department, Sharif University of Technology, 2012-13, BSc Thesis
  • Aggregation Properties of Stiff Polyelectrolytes in Presence of Multivalent Salt, Coarse Grainedm MD Simulation, with Professor M. R. Ejtehadi, Physics Department, Sharif University of Technology, 2011-12
